column5: I live in east central saskatchewan i have excellent walleye fishing 40 minutes away. but nothing compares to the annual spring pilgrimage up to flin flon/creighton area for the fishing and rugged outdoors. i noticed in some of the earlier threads some guys say "stay in the states" i say go ahead but they won't realize what they are missing. i fish from 4;30 am to noon then go out for the late bite at about 4;00 til 11;00 pm and there is always enough light. anyways my question is where do the rest of you go when youb go north of the 55th parallel.
